channel.title: Constant 'Error Connecting to Server'
channel.description: Okay, so I haven't been on Moparscape in a long time, and when I went on today, I saw Moparscape 4.0. I was like "Awesome, finally!" then, I waited a couple of minutes for it to load for the first time, and then, I went File, Start server, entered a username and password, entered it, and I got Error connecting to server. What are some reasons that it would do this? Any help is greatly appreciated. :(

item.title: Constant 'Error Connecting to Server'
item.dc:creator: @Symbian Symbian
item.description:
@Symbian wrote:

[quote=“trane101, post:1, topic:331349”]Okay, so I haven’t been on Moparscape in a long time, and when I went on today, I saw Moparscape 4.0. I was like “Awesome, finally!” then, I waited a couple of minutes for it to load for the first time, and then, I went File, Start server, entered a username and password, entered it, and I got Error connecting to server.
What are some reasons that it would do this?
Any help is greatly appreciated. :([/quote]

Are you entering in your IP or do you think Moparscape 4.0 is it’s own game? Well, it’s not.

God Willem:

I know that it is of no help, but i have the same thing with my server…

Leave where it says “Server IP:” blank.

Read full topic

item.title: Constant 'Error Connecting to Server'
item.dc:creator: @trane101 trane101
item.description:
@trane101 wrote:

Newty:

If you tried starting a 508 server it is because starting a 508 server is not currently implemented in Moparscape 4.0

I’ve tried both servers.

Read full topic
